comments:
3.3 RC1

When refactoring a class to rename it's type, all the breakpoints were removed and there were multiple instances of the following exception in my log.

I have not been able to reproduce since, and may be related to bug 184915, which I experienced after the rename failed.

In the class I had line, watchpoint, method, and class breakpoints.  I renamed the file using the shortcut key.  In the breakpoints view I had organized the breakpoints by several levels (using the advanced... settings).

Error

I think this is a side effect of 184915, as there is no chance the name of a breakpoint category can be null, as the constructors are only called in one place with an NLS'd tring passed in as the name. 

I am inclined to mark this as invalid...
Changing OS from Mac OS to Mac OS X as per bug 185991
I can't reproduce this and I haven't seen it since I filed it.  The categories never are given a null value as their name.  Closing as INVALID.
